apple_vendor_description: This intimate emoji on Apple devices depicts two individuals sharing a tender kiss, rendered with Apple's characteristic soft lighting and rounded forms. The light-skinned man and dark-skinned man are illustrated with gentle expressions and natural skin tones, emphasizing affection and closeness through subtle 3D shading. The interplay of light and shadow on their faces highlights the warmth of the moment, making it an ideal symbol for romantic love, deep connection, or heartfelt goodbyes shared between men.
